turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order an espresso from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which one do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have anything seasonal right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have Black and White Mocha, Chestnut Praline, Eggnog, Caramel Brulee, and Gingerbread. They also have those in iced versions, plus a Peppermint.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Iced coffee doesn't sound good right now. A gingerbread latte sounds good, though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the standard 2% milk and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What other milks do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond, coconut, nonfat, whole, and soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk sounds good. And no whipped topping.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Where are you right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm stuck in traffic on I-235 in Des Moines.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you in the east or west part of Des Moines?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm kind of in the middle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's one nearby at 10th and Locust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's close by. I can get there pretty soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. The order's been placed at the 10th and Locust Starbucks. It will be ready for pickup in about 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Do I need to pay when I get there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your card will be automatically charged, and you should be getting a text message receipt soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks! I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
